graph_title: People that visit parks and open spaces at least once a week
indicator_definition: Forest area as a proportion of total land area

target_name: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements
indicator_available: Proportion respondents who visit parks and open spaces at least once a week
indicator_description: Proportion of respondents to quality of life survey that gave an answer saying they visited parks and open spaces at least once a week.
computation_definitions: Proportion of respondents to quality of life survey that gave an answer saying they visited parks and open spaces at least once a week.
